Graph inverse semigroups
In this chapter we describe a class of semigroups arising from directed graphs.
The functionality in &Semigroups; for graph inverse semigroups was written jointly by Zak Mesyan (UCCS) and J. D. Mitchell (St Andrews). The functionality for graph inverse semigroup congruences was written by Marina Anagnostopoulou-Merkouri.
